aboutAlternative.text: I am a data science professional with a breadth of experience and expertise ranging from software development, data analysis, statistics, machine learning and NLP.

educations.title: Columbia University in the City of New York

given.text: Vishal is one of the most talented Data Engineers I have had the pleasure of working with. He created tools that automated data collection and analysis that saved the team lot of time and effort. Vishal has great ability to understand the problem, dive deep and come up with robust solutions. At Amazon Robotics he is developing detailed math models to estimate the impact of different variables on important system KPIs. The results of his models were found to be very precise on validation. Vishal is also always curious and eager to learn new things. See less

Vishal worked on a number of business-critical engineering projects as part of Pfizer's Data Science team, still very much in its incipient stage. His technical excellence and curiosity helped drive the success of these projects and the growth of the team from to prototyping to production-quality analytics platforms. He was an absolute pleasure to manage and work with. See less

items: Comparing LSH and Vector Aggregation algorithms for finding closest pair problem

A Learning-based Sampling Approach to Extractive Summarization
